title: Foolproof mini cupcakes
ingredients: ['For the cupcakes', '125g butter, room temperature', '125g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '125g plain flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '2 tespoons vanilla extract', '2 to 3 tablespoons milk', '2 tablespoons dark cocoa powder, dissolved in 4 tablespoons hot water', 'For the chocolate buttercream', '50g good quality baking chocolate', '30g butter', '125g icing sugar', '2 tablespoons milk']
